flawed_nl_solution:
Mary gives away 26/2 = <<26/2=13.0>>13.0 blue shirts.
Mary gives away 36/3 = <<36/3=12.0>>12.0 brown shirts.
Mary has 26-13.0 = <<26-13.0=18.0>>18.0 blue shirts left.
Mary has 36-12.0 = <<36-12.0=24.0>>24.0 brown shirts left.
Mary has 18.0+24.0 = <<18.0+24.0=42.0>>42.0 shirts left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13.0, not 18.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
